StorageManagerAdaptor
Functions
add

Adds a key-value pair to storage.  Should the key already exist, the value will be replaced

Arguments
key

The key to add

value

The value to add under the key.

get

Callback function pointer to native (kotlin/swift) code for getting a key.

remove

Callback function pointer to native (kotlin/swift) code for removing a key.  This referenced function MUST be idempotent.  In particular, it must treat removing a non-existent key as a normal and expected circumstance, simply returning () and not an error.

blah_version

Returns the current version of this lib

Returns

String representation of the version of this lib

camelVersion
fun `camelVersion`(): kotlin.String

Returns the current version of this lib

Returns

String representation of the version of this lib
